headline: Protect your team with Cloudflare Gateway
keywords: Cloudflare Zero Trust, Cloudflare Gateway, Security, Product News, DNS, Resolver, 1.1.1.1
description: On January 7th, we announced Cloudflare for Teams, a new way to protect organizations and their employees globally, without sacrificing performance. Cloudflare for Teams centers around two core products - Cloudflare Access and Cloudflare Gateway.
